tokens.name: Koin
tokens.description: Native token of Koinos.

tokens.name: Virtual Hash Power
tokens.description: The fuel for producing blocks on Koinos.

tokens.name: Chainge ETH
tokens.description: Wrapped Ethereum via chainge finance.

tokens.name: Chainge USDT
tokens.description: Wrapped Tether USD via chainge finance.

tokens.name: Chainge BTC
tokens.description: Wrapped Bitcoin via chainge finance.

tokens.name: Pooled VHP
tokens.description: The token issued by BurnKoin when KOIN or VHP deposits are made into the pool. Upon KOIN/VHP withdrawal, pVHP is burnt. The ratio at which pVHP is issued/redeemed for KOIN increases steadily as the network issues mining rewards.

tokens.name: Kanvas
tokens.description: The first collaborative and decentralized canvas, based on the first fee-less smart-contract blockchain.

tokens.name: Bitkoin
tokens.description: Bitkoin: Pioneering a Crypto Revolution! The first-ever cryptocurrency dropped via NFTs that will be gracefully disabled, ensuring a secure and thrilling entry into the crypto world. Experience Bitkoin – Where Innovation Meets Security! Our groundbreaking crypto is ushered in through NFTs, a novel approach that guarantees peace of mind with automatic NFT deactivation. Unlock Bitkoin, Unlock Possibilities! The future of crypto is here, delivered through NFTs that'll blaze a trail. Get ready for a secure, seamless, and sensational crypto journey like never before.

tokens.name: Koin Crew Token
tokens.description: Koin Crew Token in the official community coin crafted exclusively for the ardent supporters of Koin Crew. This token is not just a digital asset; it symbolizes the unwavering faith and commitment of the Koin Crew community.

tokens.name: DARE
tokens.description: D.A.R.E. (DRUGS) is dedicated to spreading comical marketing in the Koinos ecosystem and building community engagement.

tokens.name: Liquidity
tokens.description: Liquidity (UP) Coin addresses the liquidity challenges on the Koinos Network while providing opportunities for users to make swaps with arbitrage.

tokens.name: PunksKoin
tokens.description: PunksKoin is an innovative cryptocurrency that is allocated each month for the owners of the Koinos Punks and Koinos CyborgPunks NFT. Get your punk and get a steady supply of PunksKoin each month until all the crypto has been allocated to the NFT holders. PunksKoin has a fair launch with 0% for Founders, 0% Royalties, and 0% Fees and 100& allocated to the NFT holders.

tokens.name: Koin Ogas
tokens.description: Welcome to Koin Ogas (OGAS) - a fun, meme-centric token with zero gas fees, embodying Koinos blockchain's spirit. It's more than a token; it's a movement.

tokens.name: Egg
tokens.description: A satirical project with a fixed supply of 1, meant to spurn discussion on the absurdities of most crypto tokenomics and valuations. A true tokenized art piece.

tokens.name: Dogekoinos
tokens.description: Memecoin for the love of shiba inus , its mainly done for fun and to encourage users activity on the koinos ecosystem. A presale was made on koincity for the launch of DGK.

tokens.name: KroKoin
tokens.description: KroKoin ($KROK) is the first reflection token on Koinos. It features a 5% tax on each transaction. Half of the supply was burnt at the start of the project. Hence, 2.5% is burnt at each transaction and the remaining 2.5% are distributed proportionnally between holders.

tokens.name: Koinos Garden
tokens.description: Koinos Garden is a collection of 1000 unique Goat NFTs coexisting on the Koinos blockchain granting access to an investment DAO.

tokens.name: Maine Koon
tokens.description: Maine Koon is the purr-fectly unique cat-themed Meme Token that's clawing its way into the future. This token isn't just another cat in the crypto alley—it comes with frisky airdrops and purr-lific staking rewards. Along with the Maine Koon Token, we're unleashing a litter of 3,000 unique Maine Koon NFTs on the gas-free Koinos blockchain, promising a hiss-terically vibrant community.

tokens.name: GAS FEEs
tokens.description: Gas Fees is a cryptocurrency meme token on the Koinos blockchain with 0 fees. We poke fun at blockchains like Ethereum and other gas fee based chains, offering a fee-free alternative for users to enjoy.

tokens.name: Real World Assets
tokens.description: Fair launched, no presale, 20% of supply added as initial project liquidity. RWA paired with $UP, $KOIN, $PUNKSK. 80% of supply farmed through liquidity staking over 6.5 years. Tokens are used for various stake to earn opportunities and will offer new use cases in support of the RWA NFT collection.

tokens.name: Stealth I RUN
tokens.description: Token launched with 70% of supply added to liquidity and 30% of supply available through stake to earn on Koincity over 12 years. LP tokens from launch are available to farm over a 3 year period using the RUN token, also on Koincity. The RUN token will be used to fund the purchase of various real estate properties around the globe, as market cap milestones are reached.  Individuals will then be able to use their RUN tokens to cover the cost of staying at any of our rental properties. Token holders will also have voting power to influence the locations of real estate purchased that we will then rent out.

tokens.name: Bald Levine
tokens.description: Bald Levine intends to be the most iconic memecoin in Koinos ecosystem. It features a bald version of Koinos co-founder Andrew Levine.

tokens.name: Titcoin
tokens.description: Titcoin is based on Satoshi Nakamoto's (creator of Bitcoin) vision to name his token Titcoin instead of the now so popular Bitcoin. His intention was to get more attention for his then not so well-known token. And also we are just in love with tits! All sorts and sizes. We are absolutely crazy about them. We just can't get enough of them. But we can do more than just worshipping them.

tokens.name: Rich Duck
tokens.description: Rich Duck Token (QUACK), a thrilling cryptocurrency inspired by Scrooge McDuck, the richest duck in the world! QUACK unites fans of classic comics, crypto enthusiasts, and adventure seekers in a journey of wealth and discovery. Capture the essence of Scrooge’s rise from humble beginnings to fortune through hard work, cleverness, and luck.

tokens.name: 52KPH
tokens.description: 52KPH Fan Token.

tokens.name: Faith
tokens.description: The $FAITH token is the main currency of Lords Forsaken, used for in-game transactions, rewards, and NFT card packs. It powers player engagement and supports DeFi liquidity within the game’s ecosystem.
